item.title: Flight Crew/Supernumerary Escape Devices – Observer's Seat Inoperative – Escape Harnesses

remarks.para: May be inoperative provided inoperative escape harness(es) is removed from installed location.

numlitem.para: Operations are limited to not more than two flight days before repair is made.

placard.para: Placard near upper EICAS "# ESCAPE HARNESS(ES) INOP".

numlitem.para: Ensure inoperative escape harness(es) has been removed from the aircraft.
